name: love quest クエストを愛します the love maze 愛の迷路 valentines day
name_original: love quest クエストを愛します the love maze 愛の迷路 valentines day
description:
A Japanese 60s dating game show, love quest is a 2 player game where one player must help the other through an invisible love maze. The goal of the game is to reach Love Mountain and have good love.

each player must download one version of the game either [fly] or [runner]

[fly] - can see the entire Maze and has to help the other player through it.

[runner] - this player is inside the invisible Maze and must follow instructions.

https://drive.google.com/folderview?id=0B2nAaOVTTxffUE4weXFUVWZET2c&usp=sharing
